name: @supercat1337/event-emitter-ext
description: Event Emitter Ext. Typed event emitter that can be used in any environment. Batch event emitter. Ordered event emitter.

scripts.build: npm run remove_type_files && npm run build_esm && npm run build_esm_min && npm run create_types
scripts.remove_type_files: del /q *.d.ts *.d.ts.map && cd dist && del /s /q *.d.ts *.d.ts.map && cd ../src && del /s /q *.d.ts *.d.ts.map && cd ..
